text: William Thomas Belden (January 5, 1949 â€“ January 18, 2025) was an American rower. Belden competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was born on 5 January 1949.Bill Belden Belden died on January 18, 2025, at the age of 76. == References == Category:1949 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American rowers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
